meanings.definition: A person who teaches or instructs at a college or university.
meanings.sent1: The professors at the university are very knowledgeable.
meanings.sent2: The professors conducted an engaging lecture on history.
meanings.sent3: The professors decided to have a dance-off to determine the best teacher.
meanings.sent4: In the world of academia, professors are the guiding stars for students.
meanings.sent5: The professors' passion for teaching shines through in their classes.

meanings.definition: To claim or declare openly or proudly.
meanings.sent1: She professors her love for literature every chance she gets.
meanings.sent2: He professors his innocence in the matter.
meanings.sent3: The cat professors its ownership of the house by leaving fur everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The sun professors its power by shining brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The child professors his bravery by standing up to the bully.
